Package gobblin.runtime.std

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultConfigurableImpl
    Default immutable implementation for Configurable interface.
    DefaultJobCatalogListenerImpl
    Default NOOP implementation for JobCatalogListener.
    DefaultJobExecutionStateListenerImpl
    Default NOOP implementation for a JobExecutionStateListener.
    DefaultJobLifecycleListenerImpl
    Default NOOP implementation for JobLifecycleListener.
    DefaultJobSpecScheduleImpl
    Simple POJO implementation of JobSpecSchedule
    FilteredJobLifecycleListener
    A listener that can delegate to another JobLifecycleListener only callbacks that are relevant to a specific Jobs.
    JobExecutionStateListeners
    A helper class to maintain a list of JobExecutionStateListener instances.
    JobExecutionUpdatable
    Identifies a specific execution of a JobSpec
    JobLifecycleListenersList
    A default implementation to manage a list of JobLifecycleListener
    JobSpecFilter
    A helper class to create JobSpec predicates.
    JobSpecFilter.Builder
